name: @adobe/reactor-sandbox
description: Tasks for creating a sandbox for manually testing Launch extensions.

scripts.reactor-bridge-check: cmp --silent public/extensionbridge/extensionbridge-child.js node_modules/@adobe/reactor-bridge/dist/extensionbridge-child.js || (echo 'Extension bridge is out of date. Please go to the sandbox folder and run `npm run reactor-bridge-update`.' && exit 1)
scripts.build:viewsEditor: rm -rf dist && cp -r src/client/public dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/client/src/viewSandbox.js --out-dir dist --out-file viewSandbox.js --no-cache
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:viewsEditor && npm run build:rulesEditor
scripts.start:viewsEditor: watch "cp -v -r ./src/client/public/ dist" ./src/client/public & parcel watch src/client/src/viewSandbox.js --out-dir dist --out-file viewSandbox.js --no-cache
scripts.start: rm -rf dist && npm run start:viewsEditor && npm run start:rulesEditor
